a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Millennium Development Goal (MDG) 5.A was to reduce the global maternal mortality ratio (maternal deaths per
100,000 live births) by 75% from 1991 levels by 2015. This target was not achieved.

text.textPath: Global target: reduce by 75% (to 95 per 100,000 live births) by 2015
Global target: reduce by 75% (to 95 per 100,000 live births) by 2015

text.tspan: Data source: World Health Organization (via World Bank)
